thread.section_title: Goldcar opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Goldcar | www.goldcar.com | 11 de 714
thread.title: Jayne Pitts

author: Jayne Pitts
title: Jayne Pitts
text: we have used GOLDCAR for many years now in either Canaries or mainland spain, we have always been very happy with their service, on one occasion our hire broke down 3 days into our holiday i rang GOLDCAR then sent someone out to pick up the broken down car within an hour and replaced with another vehicle, no problem no fuss no hassle, excellent customer service. we would, and have highly recommended GOLDCAR to our friends. You can't go wrong with 'GOLDCAR' .... you only have to see the amount of customers at their desk at the airports.. speaks for itself , :)
